All functions

log_lik_dynamic

log_lik_flocker()

Compute unit-wise or series-wise log-likelihood matrix for a flocker_fit object

log_lik_occupancy_single_C()

A log-likelihood function for the rep-constant occupancy model, sufficient for brms::loo() to work.

loo_compare_flocker()

LOO comparisons for flocker models.

loo_flocker()

Compute loo for flocker_fit objects

loo_flocker_onefit()

Compute loo for a single flocker_fit object

make_colex_likelihoods()

Create Stan code for transition log-likelihoods in colex model. These likelihoods ignore disallowed possibilities (detections on unoccupied units); such possibilities are excluded via the control flow in the implementation of the forward algorithm.

make_emission_1()

Create Stan code for the emission log-likelihood given that the true state equals one in a rep-varying model.

make_emission_1_C()

Create Stan code for the emission log-likelihood given that the true state equals one in a rep-constant model.

make_flocker_data()

Format data for occupancy model with flock().

make_flocker_data_augmented()

#' Format data for data-augmented occupancy model, to be passed to flock().

make_flocker_data_dynamic()

Format data for dynamic (multi-season) occupancy model, to be passed to flock().

make_flocker_data_static()

Format data for single-season occupancy model, to be passed to flock().

make_forward_colex()

Create Stan code for forward_colex function, an implementation of the forward algorithm for use in colex models.

make_occupancy_augmented_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_augmented_lpmf for rep-varying model.

make_occupancy_multi_autologistic_eq_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_multi_autologistic_eq_lpmf.

make_occupancy_multi_autologistic_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_multi_autologistic_lpmf.

make_occupancy_multi_colex_eq_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_multi_colex_eq_lpmf.

make_occupancy_multi_colex_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_multi_colex_lpmf.

make_occupancy_single_C_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_single_C_lpmf. The purpose of defining this custom family, rather than using brms's zero-inflated binomial, is to ensure that the occupancy parameters are interpretable with values of 1 in the marginalized state reflecting occupancy rather than non- occupancy.

make_occupancy_single_lpmf()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_single_lpmf.

make_occupancy_single_partial_sum()

Create Stan code for likelihood function occupancy_single_lpmf.

max_position_not_na()

get largest index in a vector that is not NA

multi_init_types()

possible values for the `multi_init` parameter if not NULL

multi_types()

flocker_data_output_types valid for use with colex models

new_array()

create a new array with the dimensions of an old array

new_matrix()

create a new matrix with the dimensions of an old matrix

nslice()

Get third dimension of a 3D array

occupancy_augmented()

Define the rep-varying augmented occupancy family

occupancy_multi_autologistic()

Define the autologistic family

occupancy_multi_autologistic_eq()

Define the autologistic_eq family

occupancy_multi_colex()

Define the colonization-extinction equilibrium family

occupancy_single()

Define the rep-varying occupancy family

occupancy_single_C()

Define the rep-constant occupancy family

occupancy_single_C_lpmf()

An R implementation of the rep constant lpmf without the binomial coefficient.

occupancy_single_C_lpmf_with_coef()

An R implementation of occupancy_C_lpmf including the binomial coefficient. Not currently in use.

occupancy_single_threaded()

Define the rep-varying occupancy family with threading

params_by_type

A list of distributional parameters by model type

posterior_epred_occupancy_single_C()

A posterior epred function for the rep-constant occupancy model, sufficient for brms::posterior_epred() to work.

posterior_predict_occupancy_single_C()

A posterior predict function for the rep-constant occupancy model, sufficient for brms::predict.brmsfit() to work.

predict_flocker()

Get posterior predictions from a flocker model

remove_rownames()

remove rownames

rep_constant_types()

flocker_data_output_types that yield rep-constant models

reshape a matrix of values into a stack of arrays via get_positions

util for creating example data

shared_elements()

get shared elements between two vectors

simulate_flocker_data()

Simulate data for use with make_flocker_data() and downstream functions.

stack_matrix()

rbind a matrix or dataframe to itself n times

summarise_fun()

summarize matrix of linear predictors to its mean and CI

threading_types()

flocker_data_output_types valid for use with threading

type_flocker_fit()

Check validity of params passed to `flock` if `type` is `augmented`

validate_param_combos_single()

Check validity of params passed to `flock` if `type` is `single`

validate_param_combos_single_C()

Check validity of params passed to `flock` if `type` is `single_C`

validate_param_combos_single_generic()

Check validity of some params passed to flock if `type` is `single` or `single_C`

validate_params_individually()

Check individual validity of params passed to `flock`

validate_unit_formula_variables()
